column5: Luck enough to have Monday off from school, so woke up early and went fishing! Saw the earlier post about License update, haha excellent reminder! Got mine through the website, easy and simple.  A few eastern tribs were frozen, except for this particular river. Winter green with good flow!  Chartuse was the lucky colour roe bag  Its a male right?
Nice fish.  Thanks for posting the photo.  Too bad about not getting to have school today.  Maybe they'll catch up.  Later.
nice coloured up male...its been in the river for a while  man you wear a canada goose jacket to go fishing??what if those fish slime gets all over ur jacket??
Congrats on the first fish of the year!  And a real nice on at that!
Slime initiation, what's wrong with that? At least he's toasty warm. Feeling cold while fishing makes it less desirable.   Nice 'bow.
Haha I know I shouldn't wear the Goose to go fishing, but like HearingFish said, its just so warm that none of my other jackets can compair.

Nice fish !  I never would have thought about hitting the tribs at this time of year.  Before reading reading your post, I saw some steelie action on the river in Ajax south of the big 4 (trying not to give the exact location !).  Streamers seem to work.  Mike
Hey Will great looking fish congrats on your first fish of 2009  Rob
Congratulations young_one on your first    A real nice one for sure  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish , great pic, wear what ya gotta wear...lol
Very Nice!!!  good way to start the year  Maureen
If anything, I'd say the Canadian parka is good luck; The Inuit seemed to have done pretty well by it too!  Nice rainbow, thanks for the photo post!
